Pipeline Overview

This dashboard is used to visualize basic information about our DevOps pipeline.

  • Build Stage
    Source code is tested and packaged.
  • Test Stage
    Automated checks validate the application.
  • Deploy Stage
    Artifacts are deployed to the cloud environment.
